To get a working directory
```{r}
getwd()
```

Divider Function
```{r}
divider = function(x,y)
{
  result = x/y
  print(result)
}
divider(100,20)
```
Multiplier Function
```{r}
multiply = function(x,y)
{
  result = x*y
  print(result)
}
multiply(8,20)
```
Concatenation and Arrays
```{r}
d=c(1:5)
d
d+6
d-2
```
R is a vectorized language
```{r}
e=c(1:10)
e
f=e*2
f
g=f/2
g
```
Matrix Creation
```{r}
M=matrix(1:15,nrow=3)
M
```
